A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst Star Wars film to date. Huge waste of such tremendous potential and opportunities to create something great. Poor choices made in terms of plot and character development. Boring\, unimaginative \"twists\". Truly unfunny attempts at humor which only cheapen the appeal of certain key characters. Imagine every wrong decision they could have made for this film and the future of Star Wars - that's what they've managed to achieve.
